CustomField.description: Middle-range discount based on past sales. If a sales rep wants to use this price, they must discount the quote line manually. This discount may require approvals based on your org's approval settings.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Middle-range discount based on past sales. If a sales rep wants to use this price, they must discount the quote line manually. This discount may require approvals based on your org's approval settings.
CustomField.label: Norm Discount (%)
